info.name: Dark Web UI for qBittorrent
info.description:
A carefully designed dark style for the qBittorrent web UI, because one didn't exist already. Some minor things are a bit weird, but it should be 99% styled.

Suggestions? Issues? Did I miss something? Contact me via one of a few methods, found on my contact page: https://www.techjargaming.com/contact/

Like this style a lot and feel the urge to donate? Send me some cryptocurrency!
XMR: 44ZeUxo7Y1XfAH3tfRFkmjjX19hx9EQqt89aMPiGmRaG9hzPJ4Ux9RY1txDxsJiFPPToh48Q1bzNm4WqkuZSvSNbELAxFTL
BTC: 1BmAqGBJBJpBcYf69FUstKw5aBCY3Wha4J
BCH: 1CaXaaNd7uDEcU2hpdEb3Qtx31ZfYThsXS
ETH: 0x6DFFc78A73232083AeDa3B3854aAA81dE8EdFa93
ETC: 0xd8170b8A004A8F0538D7183b152bD88F980038a4
LTC: LNTeAKcez425iJdiTmTSebKdEfhEwLwUfw
info.additionalInfo: You'll need to edit the style and set the "applies to" URL to your own web UI address. Changelog March 9, 2017 - Missed context sub-menu March 8, 2017 - Fix table header in qBittorrent 3.3.11 - Skin context menu because I forgot - Some other minor stuff March 7, 2017 - Initial release
